titleStmt.title: By the King, a declaration as we cannot consider this invitation of our kingdoms by the Prince of Orange without horror ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)
James II, King of England, 1633-1701.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Bill, Henry Hills, and Thomas Newcomb ...,

notesStmt.note: Other title information from first 2 lines of text.
"Given at our court at Whitehall the 6th day of November, 1688. In the fourth year of our reign."
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries Library, London.
